text: A cool small evening shrunk to a dog bark and the clank of a bucket - And you listening.
And you listening. A spider's web, tense for the dew's touch.
A spider's web, tense for the dew's touch. A pail lifted, still and brimming - mirror
A pail lifted, still and brimming - mirror%% To tempt a first star to a tremor.
To tempt a first star to a tremor. Cows are going home in the lane there, looping the hedges with their warm
Cows are going home in the lane there, looping the hedges with their warm%% wreaths of breath -
wreaths of breath - A dark river of blood, many boulders,
A dark river of blood, many boulders, Balancing unspilled milk.
Balancing unspilled milk. 'Moon!' you cry suddenly, 'Moon!  Moon!'
'Moon!' you cry suddenly, 'Moon!  Moon!'%% The moon has stepped back like an artist gazing amazed at a work
The moon has stepped back like an artist gazing amazed at a work%% That points at him amazed.
